title: Exponent Bases
text: When the exponents share the same base, the exponents can be directly equated.

title: Solving for $$x$$
text: To solve for $$x$$, set the two expressions with $$x$$ in the exponents equal to each other and solve.

title: Isolate $$x$$
text: Isolate $$x$$ by subtracting $$x$$ from both sides and adding $$4$$, so one side only has $$x$$ and the other side only has a constant.
